#Program for salesforce

import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

public class Salesforcelocators {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//chromedriver.exe
		System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver", "C:\\TINA\\selenium\\chromedriver_win32\\chromedriver.exe");
	WebDriver driver=new ChromeDriver();
	driver.get("https://www.salesforce.com/");
	driver.findElement(By.linkText("https://login.salesforce.com/?locale=in")).click();
	driver.findElement(By.id("username")).sendKeys("Agatin01");
	driver.findElement(By.name("pw")).sendKeys("agatin01");
	driver.findElement(By.className("button r4 wide primary")).click();

	}

}
